Firestarter.description: 你可以自由驾驭你体内的火焰。你可以随意以原能内在法术的形式施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{燃火术 Produce Flame}。它会升阶到等于你等级一半（向上取整）的法术环级。
Firestarter.name: 引火者 Firestarter

Searing Strikes.name: 灼热打击 Searing Strikes
Searing Strikes.description: 当你以巨大的力量击中敌人时，你体内的火焰会回应你的呼唤，沿着你的手指迅速点燃并灼烧你的敌人。在对相邻生物进行近战打击时，你的重击会额外造成[[/r 1d4[persistent,fire]]]伤害。

Self-Immolate.name: 自然焚烧 Self-Immolate
Self-Immolate.description:
频率 每小时一次

你燃起自己的余烬，产生一团@template[emanation|distance:5]范围的浓烟。你失去[[/r @actor.level #Lost Hit Points]]{等于你等级数值}的生命值。所有在范围内的生物都视为隐蔽状态，且其他生物对他们而言也是@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。浓烟会持续1分钟，或者直到被强风驱散。

Smoke Vision.name: 烟雾视觉 Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: 和火焰一样，灰烬和烟雾也是你存在的一部分。通过将自己与烟雾中的微粒调和，你可以清楚地看透它。烟雾不会影响你的视觉；你可以忽视由烟雾产生的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

Wildfire Leshy Familiar.name: 野火莱西魔宠 Wildfire Leshy Familiar
Wildfire Leshy Familiar.description: 你很容易吸引较弱的野火莱西来帮助你。选取野火莱西为魔宠所要的需求魔宠能力数量比正常情况下少两个。

Amphibious Practice.name: Amphibious Practice
Amphibious Practice.description: You’ve practiced movement both on land and underwater. Your land Speed increases from 20 feet to 25 feet; if you have the landwalker heritage, your swim Speed increases to 30 feet instead.

Animal Facade.name: Animal Facade
Animal Facade.description: Seeing a sprite can sometimes give the game away, so you’ve learned how to take the form of a seemingly-harmless animal in order to lurk about unnoticed. Your animal form is a specific form from a Tiny terrestrial animal. This form is distinctive and unique, and you change into the same form each time. In your animal form, you might possess a distinguishing characteristic that hints at your true nature as a sprite, or there might be nothing to distinguish you from other animals of the same species. Using Animal Facade counts as creating a disguise for the Impersonate use of Deception, though only to adopt your alternate form. In this Tiny animal form, you gain the statistics of a 1st-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}. You can remain in your alternate form indefinitely, and you can shift back to your true sprite form by using this action again.

Battle Ready.name: Battle Ready
Battle Ready.description:
Trigger you roll initiative

You are ready for a fight to break out at any moment. You Interact to draw a weapon.

Bird Song.name: 鸟之歌 Bird Song
Bird Song.description: 你能听懂鸟鸣并能和鸟类对话，一大部分原因是由于你认为它们以自己的方式与伟大神曲有所联系。你可以询问并从鸟类那里获得答案，也能对鸟类使用交涉技能。GM决定哪些动物算作鸟类。

Bountiful Banquet.name: Bountiful Banquet
Bountiful Banquet.description: You can summon extraplanar entities to aid you in creating a fabulous feast to soothe the body and delight the palate of all your guests. You learn the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yRf59eFtZ50cGlem]{Heroes' Feast} ritual, and you can cast this ritual without needing any secondary casters by increasing the Primary Check DC by 2, though in that case you must also make one of the listed Secondary Checks. You can use Cooking Lore for the primary check by increasing its DC by 2. If you make both modifications, the DC increases are cumulative.

Brawn Over Brains.name: Brawn Over Brains
Brawn Over Brains.description: When your mind becomes clouded, you know to hit harder rather than smarter. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage rolls on your melee Strikes equal to the value of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} condition (to a maximum of a +4 circumstance bonus) whenever you have the stupefied condition.

Budding Hero.name: Budding Hero
Budding Hero.description:
You were budded from a parent, most likely a leader descended from a heroic line. Assuming your parent descended from heroes, your choriste expects big things from you. You’re trained in Diplomacy (or another skill if you were already trained in Diplomacy), and you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Group Impression} skill feat. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks against other chochori, which increases to a +2 circumstance bonus if you’re a master in Diplomacy.

Special You can only select this feat at 1st level, and you can’t retrain into this feat or from this feat.

Chochori Weapon Flow.description: You fight with an ebb and flow, allowing your chochori weapons to perform at their best. Whenever you critically hit using a chochori weapon, a tentacle Strike from the tendrilweaver heritage, or one of the weapons listed in Chochori Weapon Familiarity feat, you apply the weapon’s critical specialization effect.
Chochori Weapon Flow.name: Chochori Weapon Flow

Chora's Call.name: Chora's Call
Chora's Call.description:
Frequency once per day

You call forth the power of your chora to wreak havoc upon your foes. Elemental mayhem descends upon a @template[burst|distance:20] within 120 feet. All the creatures in the area take @Damage[3d6[fire]]{3d6} damage and [[/r 1d6[persistent,fire]]], with a @Check[reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic] save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. The damage type for both the damage and the persistent damage depends on your chora, and Chora’s Call gains an additional trait depending on your chora. If you change your chora later in life during a major life transition, your damage type and trait change to match. At 10th level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage from Chora’s Call increases by 1d6, to a maximum of 9d6 at 20th level.

The damage type and trait for each chora are as follows: If you’re aikrys, the damage is slashing and the trait is air; if you’re carbor, the damage is piercing, and the trait is plant; if you’re farose, the damage and trait are both fire; if you’re hypisk, the damage is bludgeoning and the trait is water; if you’re jamambri, the damage and trait are both electricity; if you’re terath, the damage is bludgeoning and the trait is earth; if you’re vergiss, the damage and trait are both cold.

Chronicler Obsession.name: 编年者的执念 Chronicler Obsession
Chronicler Obsession.description: 你痴迷于鹦鹉人的历史，致力于寻找失落的历史碎片和保存已知的那些你比任何人都了解的历史，而且你从不出错。你在针对鹦鹉人、鹦鹉人社会和鹦鹉人历史的回忆知识检定中获得+1环境加值。如果你在用于检定的技能上达到大师熟练度，你获得+2环境加值；如果该技能熟练度为传奇，你获得+3环境加值。如果你在针对以上主题的回忆知识检定中大失败，你转而获得失败。如果你在针对以上主题的回忆知识检定中成功，你获得额外信息，如果你获得大成功，根据GM判断，你可以获得比正常更多的信息。

Cooking Weapon Expertise.name: Cooking Weapon Expertise
Cooking Weapon Expertise.description: Like an exquisite dish of warfare, you blend your familiarity with cooking implements with your class’s training and techniques in order to create a whole that is greater than the sum of its parts. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in daggers, filcher’s forks, hatchets, kamas, light hammers, and all orpok weapons in which you are trained.

Cooking Weapon Familiarity.name: Cooking Weapon Familiarity
Cooking Weapon Familiarity.description:
You are handy with cooking implements that might double as weapons in desperate straits, such as cleavers, filleting knives, and tenderizing mallets. You are trained with daggers, filcher’s forks, hatchets, kamas, and light hammers, and you gain access to filcher’s forks and kamas.

In addition, you gain access to all uncommon orpok weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial orpok weapons are simple weapons and advanced orpok weapons are martial weapons.

Cooking Weapon Talent.name: Cooking Weapon Talent
Cooking Weapon Talent.description: Your talent for handling cooking implements translates into an ability to use them better in a fight. Whenever you critically hit using an orpok weapon or one of the weapons listed in the Cooking Weapon Familiarity feat, you apply the weapon’s critical specialization effect.

Coral Expansion.name: Coral Expansion
Coral Expansion.description:
Frequency once per day

Magically removing the specialization that causes your body’s polyps to differentiate into your body, you transform your entire body into undifferentiated incredibly venomous coral tendrils, stretching out to reach a distant location, then rematerialize your form in that location. The tendrils stretch out in a @template[line|distance:120] and deal @Damage[18d6[poison]] damage to all foes in the line, with a @Check[reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic] save against the higher of your class DC and spell DC, but you still have enough control of yourself not to damage your allies. Your movement as a collection of tendrils can still trigger reactions, but most reactions won’t affect you, except for those that would counteract the effect or that the GM decides would affect undifferentiated poison tendrils.

Coral Reef.name: Coral Reef
Coral Reef.description:
Frequency once per day

You call forth specialized polyps attuned to your own and form them together into a massive reef. This has effects similar to @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kOa055FIrO9Smnya]{Wall of Stone}, except the reef dies and vanishes in 1 minute if not conjured underwater. Until your next daily preparations, you maintain a link to a conjured coral reef through your shared polyps. This allows you to Interact with your coral reef in order to see through all of the reefs’ spaces, and on the other side of the reef even if it would normally block your line of sight. This reef vision lasts until the beginning of your next turn.

Counter Bully.name: Counter Bully
Counter Bully.description:
Trigger A foe causes you to gain the frightened condition

You are so used to dueling displays of dominance that whenever someone frightens you, you instinctively push back and intimidate them. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize} the triggering foe, and your vicious response grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Intimidation check.

Coral's Voice, Nature's Ears.name: Coral's Voice, Nature's Ears
Coral's Voice, Nature's Ears.description: You branch out from being able to communicate with coral to all other kinds of animals. You can speak to all animals, not just animals that are coral. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression} on animals (which usually uses the Diplomacy skill).

Craft Anything.name: 天工开物 Craft Anything
Craft Anything.description: Whether it’s an alchemical bomb, a snare, or anything in between, you just understand how things work and how to build them. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DMetdzt1VJL2Y62i]{Snare Crafting} skill feats.

Curl Up.name: Curl Up
Curl Up.description:
You can curl up defensively to protect yourself from harm. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-indigo-isles-character-guide-pf2e.indigo-isles-effects.fGL1U0XgSukWP23Z]{Effect: Curl Up}

Defiant Comrade.name: Defiant Comrade
Defiant Comrade.description: When your allies need help, your hard work and camaraderie gives them the power to defy their fates. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.1b55SgYTV65JvmQd]{Blessing of Defiance} once per day as a 5th-level primal innate spell.

Determined Gourmand.name: Determined Gourmand
Determined Gourmand.description: In sickness or in health, you vow to eat as much as you can, regardless of your stomach’s rumbling or the protestations of your body. The sickened condition doesn’t prevent you from ingesting anything. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @Check[fortitude|traits:action:retch|overrideTraide:true] saves made to reduce the sickened condition by retching.

Diligent Efforts.name: Diligent Efforts
Diligent Efforts.description: You have a sense of focus and concentration beyond even other hardworking orpoks. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to perform any downtime activity.

Dolent Aria.name: 忧郁咏叹调 Dolent Aria
Dolent Aria.description:
频率 每10分钟一次

你唱出美丽而悲切的旋律，将悲伤注入敌人心中。一个60尺内的敌人必须成功通过@Check[will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]豁免，对抗你的职业DC或法术DC（取其高者），否则在1分钟内陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。在此期间，该敌人每次遭到攻击时都可以尝试另一次意志豁免，成功则提前结束效果。不管成功与否，该敌人对忧郁咏叹调临时免疫24小时。

Dominator's Vigor.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You give a creature within 30 feet of you the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition

You relish in the target creature's obvious cowardice in the face of your fearsome might, restoring your vigor. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level. These temporary Hit Points last for a number of rounds equal to the frightened condition value you gave the triggering creature.
Dominator's Vigor.name: Dominator's Vigor

Drain Ingredients.name: Drain Ingredients
Drain Ingredients.description:
Frequency once per hour

You magically draw ingredients out of your enemies’ bodies, transforming them into a delicious meal, which you devour to heal you. You deal @Damage[6d6[negative]] damage to living enemies in a @template[emanation|distance:20] with a @Check[fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. You heal Hit Points equal to the damage a single creature takes; calculate the healing using the creature that took the most damage.

Critical Success The enemy is unaffected.

Success The enemy takes half damage.

Failure The enemy takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained 1}.

Critical Failure The enemy takes double damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained 2}.

Durable Ally.name: Durable Ally
Durable Ally.description: You know just how and when to advise your allies on withstanding hardship. You can use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} reaction to grant a bonus to an adjacent creature’s Fortitude saving throw. As normal for Aid, you must prepare by using an action on your turn, such as to describe to the ally how to brace themselves for trouble or how to grit their teeth through the pain.

Earth's Call.name: Earth's Call
Earth's Call.description: You can call creatures from above down to meet you on the ground below. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gPvtmKMRpg9I9D7H]{Earthbind} as a primal innate spell.

Earth's Eyes.name: Earth's Eyes
Earth's Eyes.description: Your eyes gain the depth of the caverns and the elemental protection of earth, allowing you to see in the dark. You gain darkvision.

Earth's Voice.name: Earth's Voice
Earth's Voice.description: You’ve learned how to speak with the voices inside of stones, calling upon the vitae, the fragments of the Eld within all things. While stone is not normally intelligent, you speak with the vitae, which have a personality colored by the type of stone, as well as by the type of structure the stone is part of, for worked stone. A stone’s perspective, perception, and knowledge give it a worldview different enough from a human’s that it doesn’t consider the same details important. Stones can mostly answer questions about creatures that touched them in the past and what is concealed beneath or behind them.

Earthen Burrow.name: Earthen Burrow
Earthen Burrow.description: You use your personal ties to the element of earth in order to attune yourself and burrow slowly through loose earth. You gain a burrow speed of 15 feet.

Earthen Gate.name: Earthen Gate
Earthen Gate.description: Your attunement to the earth element is so strong that you can open gateways directly to the Elemental Plane of Earth, as well as make your way back to the Material Plane. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Plane Shift} as a primal innate spell. You can cast it twice per week. You can use this plane shift innate spell only to travel back and forth between the Elemental Plane of Earth and the Material Plane. Due to your body’s natural resonance, you can act as the spell focus, and you don’t require a tuning fork.

Earthroil.name: Earthroil
Earthroil.description:
Frequency once per day

You attune yourself to the earth and manipulate its form as you command, creating a temporary region of difficult terrain in a @template[burst|distance:15] on the ground, within 60 feet. This difficult terrain formed from your Earthroil lasts for 1 minute before the earth roughly sloughs back into its original form.

Earthsense.name: Earthsense
Earthsense.description: You are constantly in tune with the earth around you, allowing you to sense all sorts of vibrations nearby. You gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense within 30 feet, which allows you to sense movements and vibrations made by creatures touching the same surface as you.

Eld's Familiar.name: Eld's Familiar
Eld's Familiar.description: You have bonded with an extremely minor monster of the Eld, a weak eldamon, and brought it into phase with the material world in order to serve as your familiar. You gain a familiar. The familiar typically looks like an animal or other creature with minor elemental features that match your chora’s element. If you change your chora later in life during a major life transition, your familiar’s features change to match (this also changes the familiar ability it gains if you have Familiar Meld).

Eye for Plunder.name: Eye for Plunder
Eye for Plunder.description: You have a supernatural sense that allows you to quickly count items, which is particularly helpful in both legal and illegal professions. You are trained in your choice of Underworld Lore or Mercantile Lore. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EqdSKqr8Qj5TUhMR]{Approximate} as a primal innate cantrip. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Familiar Meld.name: Familiar Meld
Familiar Meld.description:
The familiar you gained retrieves more of its elemental power, and it can meld into you in order to protect itself. It gains a familiar ability depending on the element of your chori as a bonus ability, which does not count against the normal limit to the number of abilities it can have. Furthermore, as a single action, which has the concentrate trait, when it’s in your space, it can meld into you. While melded, it can’t be targeted by external effects, and isn’t in the area of any area effects, However, it can’t act except to unmeld and separate itself out into your space again, which is also a single action with the concentrate trait.

The familiar ability your familiar gains for each of the traditional seven choras is as follows: If you’re aikrys, it gains flier; if you’re carbor it gains plant form even if it isn’t a plant; if you’re farose, it gains resistance and greater resistance to fire (but not to a second energy type); if you’re hypisk, it gains amphibious; if you’re jamamabri, it gains resistance and greater resistance to electricity (but not to a second energy type); if you’re terath it gains burrower; if you’re vergiss, it gains resistance and greater resistance to cold (but not to a second energy type).

Feast of Life.name: Feast of Life
Feast of Life.description:
Frequency once per day

You enter a gourmet rapture that makes it impossible to kill you as long as you keep eating. For 1 minute, you recover [[/r 15[healing]]]{15 Hit Points} at the end of each of your turns as long as you ate or drank something that turn. During this time, you can Interact to ram your face into your supplies and munch on a normal piece of food without using a hand, but you can’t use this to Activate magical or alchemical food or gain any other special effects that require eating. As long as you ate food since your last turn, you can’t die from damage during your Feast of Life, and your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition can’t increase to a value that would kill you (this stops most orpok from going beyond dying 3), though if your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} value becomes 4 or higher, you stay @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Unconscious]{Unconscious} until your wounds are treated.

Frequent Snacker.description: In addition to the normal orpok seven meals during the day, you believe in numerous hardy snacks. You can use Healthy Snack once per hour instead of once per day.
Frequent Snacker.name: Frequent Snacker

G'mayun Lore.name: 鹦鹉人学识 G'mayun Lore
G'mayun Lore.description: 你熟知鹦鹉人悠久历史的每个细节，对伟大神曲进行过深入研究。你获得表演和宗教技能的受训。如果你已经获得了其中一个技能的受训（例如通过背景或职业），你可以自选一个技能受训。你还获得鹦鹉人学识受训。

G'mayun Weapon Expertise.name: 鹦鹉人武器专精 G'mayun Weapon Expertise
G'mayun Weapon Expertise.description: 你将自己对鹦鹉人武器和职业训练的技术相融合，得到运用鹦鹉人武器的高超技巧。每当你获得能让你在某些武器上获得专家或更高熟练度的职业特性时，你也在匕首、弯刃大刀、大砍刀、反曲刀和弯刀及所有你有受训熟练度的鹦鹉人武器上获得同等熟练度。

G'mayun Weapon Familiarity.name: 鹦鹉人武器训练 G'mayun Weapon Familiarity
G'mayun Weapon Familiarity.description:
你偏爱使用可用于雕刻的短刃和拿起来宛如画笔的弧形长刀。你获得匕首、弯刃大刀、大砍刀、反曲刀和弯刀的受训熟练度，并满足反曲刀的使用许可。

此外，你获得所有罕见鹦鹉人武器的使用许可。在确定熟练度时，军用鹦鹉人武器对你来说为简易武器，而进阶鹦鹉人武器对你来说为军用武器。

G'mayun Weapon Passion.name: 鹦鹉人武器激情 G'mayun Weapon Passion
G'mayun Weapon Passion.description: 当敌人不敌时，你对鹦鹉人传统武器的激情让你发挥它们最致命的性能。每当你用鹦鹉人武器或鹦鹉人武器训练专长中列举的武器造成重击时，你可以使用该武器的重击专精效果。

Gardener.name: Gardener
Gardener.description: You’ve spent so much time tending to plants that you can instinctively look past greenery to what lies beyond or beneath it. You ignore concealment caused by foliage and you don’t take circumstance bonuses to Perception from foliage.

Hardriggan Weapon Expertise.name: Hardriggan Weapon Expertise
Hardriggan Weapon Expertise.description: Few can compare to your proficiency with the weapons hardriggans use. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in your headbutt, all hardriggan weapons in which you are trained, and the weapons you are trained with from the Hardriggan Weapon Familiarity feat.

Hardriggan Weapon Familiarity.description:
Hardriggans like to use big, intimidating weapons, and you have learned to use them well. You are trained with falchions, greataxes, greatswords, and war flails.

In addition, you gain access to all uncommon hardriggan weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial hardriggan weapons are simple weapons and advanced hardriggan weapons are martial weapons.
Hardriggan Weapon Familiarity.name: Hardriggan Weapon Familiarity

Harvest Banquet.name: Harvest Banquet
Harvest Banquet.description: Whether your ancestors learned to summon entities to create a fabulous feast from the local orpok or vice versa, you’ve refined your abilities to the point you can call forth a veritable smorgasbord without ritual assistance. You learn the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yRf59eFtZ50cGlem]{Heroes' Feast} ritual, and you can cast this ritual without any secondary casters by increasing the Primary Check DC by 2.

Healthy Snack.name: Healthy Snack
Healthy Snack.description:
Frequency once per day

You Interact to retrieve a morsel of food from somewhere on your person and then eat it, gaining an immediate restorative effect. You recover [[/r (2*@actor.level)[healing]]]{twice your level} in Hit Points and gain half your level in temporary Hit Points for 1 minute.

Horn Charge.name: Horn Charge
Horn Charge.description:
Frequency once per minute

You lean forward and charge, impaling foes with your horns. Stride once in a straight line, then make a horn Strike with the horn unarmed attack from the hardriggan ancestry. If you moved at least 10 feet and hit, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the damage roll per weapon damage die.

Incredible Growth.name: Incredible Growth
Incredible Growth.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

You grow even larger for a short time, gaining an impressive reach. You gain the effects of 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} for 1 minute.

Indigestion Resistance.name: Indigestion Resistance
Indigestion Resistance.description: Your stomach is a marvel of efficiency and resilience, even compared to the iron stomachs of other orpoks. When you succeed at a Fortitude save to reduce the sickened value, reduce it by 2 (or by 3 on a critical success).

Instant Comeback.description:
Trigger Your turn begins.

Your anger at being overwhelmed surges forth quickly, allowing you to take your revenge. You Stand.
Instant Comeback.name: Instant Comeback

Kragrak Dig.name: Kragrak Dig
Kragrak Dig.description:
Frequency once per minute

Using your connection to earth, you instantly dig a hole through loose dirt, dust, gravel, sand, and the like (though not solid stone) within reach, up to the size of a 5-foot cube. If you use this ability underneath a space occupied by an ally, that ally descends harmlessly. If you use it underneath a space occupied by a foe, the foe can either descend harmlessly or move to the nearest available space of its choice.

Invoke Name Mark.name: Invoke Name Mark
Invoke Name Mark.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You fail a Will saving throw

You call upon the power of your name in order to hold your will steadfast. You can reroll the triggering saving throw and use the better result.

Kragrak Roll.name: Kragrak Roll
Kragrak Roll.description: You can curl up into a rock or clump of earth and roll down an incline. You roll up into a ball and move up to four times your Speed in a straight line down an incline. If you reach the bottom of the incline or hit an obstacle during this first turn of movement, you stop rolling safely. Otherwise, you automatically keep rolling at this Speed during subsequent turns until you hit the bottom of the incline or an obstacle ends this movement (which can happen in the middle of your turn). You’re @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 2} during each turn after the first that you keep rolling, and if you hit an obstacle on a turn after the first, you and the obstacle both take @Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]] damage and you stop rolling.

Kragrak Shard.name: Kragrak Shard
Kragrak Shard.description: You can detach numerous small shards from your body and launch them at foes, as your body instantly regenerates the launched shards. You gain a shard ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 10 feet. The attack deals 1d4 piercing damage. Your shard is in the sling weapon group and has the propulsive trait. Like other unarmed attacks, you can improve this attack with handwraps of mighty blows.

Magical Mender.name: Magical Mender
Magical Mender.description: You have a knack for fixing things magically, perhaps when others aren’t watching. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dINQzhqGmIsqGMUY]{Mending} as a primal innate spell once per day. At 9th level, you can cast 2nd level mending, and at 13th level, you can cast 3rd-level mending.

Metabolic Recovery.name: Metabolic Recovery
Metabolic Recovery.description: You’ve regained the ability to rapidly recover via fast metabolism available to kragraks in child form, but without any risk of burning yourself out. If you rest for 10 minutes, you gain Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier × half your level. This is cumulative with any healing you receive from @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Treat Wounds]{Treat Wounds}. Your bodily regeneration also works faster than other kragraks. It typically only takes you 1 day to regrow a body part the size of a finger, 1 week for a hand, and 1 month for an arm.

Model of Durability.name: Model of Durability
Model of Durability.description: Your allies can always count on you to help them tough out the most physically demanding situations. You can use the Aid reaction to grant a bonus to an adjacent ally’s Fortitude saving throw even when you haven’t prepared to help.

Mystical Cleanse.name: Mystical Cleanse
Mystical Cleanse.description: When food goes rancid or drinks turn sour, you know how to salvage them to make them not merely edible but truly palatable. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qXTB7Ec9yYh5JPPV]{Purify Food and Drink} once per meal (at most once per hour, up to seven times each day), as a 1st-level primal innate spell.

Nutrispeaker.name: Nutrispeaker
Nutrispeaker.description:
Frequency once per day

Food resonates with the skill of the cook and the life energy of those around it, and you know how to tap into that information on a supernatural level. For 10 minutes, you can speak with any kind of food that’s been prepared for consumption.

While food is not intelligent, you speak with an animating spark within the food, formed from a combination of the ingredients’ fading essence and the cook’s mental efforts. Food doesn’t know anything prior to being prepared, but most food can describe anyone it’s been around since becoming food (including the person who prepared it) and might be able to opine as to the nature of the meal it was intended for: as a victory feast, common meal, meager subsistence, and so on. Food is surprisingly accepting about its ultimate fate of being eaten, and thus it doesn’t make any effort to avoid this topic. Fresh food tends to be lively and chatty, while food that is old or rotting tends to be slow to answer and churlish. The scope of food’s knowledge is up to the GM.

Orpok Lore.name: Orpok Lore
Orpok Lore.description: You have spent a lot of time learning about orpok history and culture, and you know its legends, heroes, and recipes well. You gain the trained proficiency rank in both Crafting and Society. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Orpok Lore.

Orpok Ways.name: Orpok Ways
Orpok Ways.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger you attempt a Intelligence or Wisdom-based skill check, but you haven’t rolled yet

You recall a relevant hero or situation from orpok history and quickly apply those historical teachings to the situation at hand. Roll the check using your Orpok Lore skill instead of the usual skill, at the same DC as normal.

Perpetual Awareness.description: Trusting your other senses as much or more than your sharp eyes, you are always aware of movement around you that might manifest as danger to you or your column. You gain motion sense as an imprecise sense out to 20 feet. Motion sense allows you to detect motion through vibration and air movement. As normal for all special senses, creatures who know you have motion sense can take precautions against it.
Perpetual Awareness.name: Perpetual Awareness

Pigheaded.name: Pigheaded
Pigheaded.description: Your stubborn will can save your life, even when you would otherwise perish. When you would die, you can attempt a @Check[flat|dc:17|showDC:all]. On a success, you’re instead reduced to 0 Hit Points and a dying value 1 less than the value that would kill you (typically, this takes you to dying 3). This has no effect against death effects or spells such as disintegrate, or other effects that annihilate you without leaving a body.

Polyp Expansion.name: Polyp Expansion
Polyp Expansion.description: You grow many additional polyps to increase the size of your body significantly and permanently. You gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} constantly.

Poppy's Peerless Pierce.name: Poppy's Peerless Pierce
Poppy's Peerless Pierce.description: Using a piratical technique passed down by Poppy von Barnacle and mastered by few others since her heyday, you effortlessly pierce a foe’s defenses and attack a foe behind them as well. Make a melee Strike with a piercing weapon against a foe within reach. This Strike ignores an amount of the foe’s Hardness or resistance equal to your level. If your attack hits and damages the target, you can compare the result of your attack roll to the AC of a foe adjacent to the first target and in a straight line behind them. Use the same damage roll against the second foe. You can attack the second foe even if they would normally be 5 feet beyond the edge of your reach. Poppy’s Peerless Pierce counts as two attacks for the purpose of calculating your multiple attack penalty.

Potion Mixologist.name: Potion Mixologist
Potion Mixologist.description: You can use the Craft activity to brew potions and poisons. You immediately gain the formulas for four common potions or ingested poisons that are 3rd level or lower. At 7th level and every 2 levels beyond that, you gain the formula for a common potion or ingested poison of your level – 2 or lower (a 5th-level potion if you’re 7th level, a 7th-level potion if you’re 9th level, and so on). You store these formulas in a formula book.

Protective Earthrune.name: Protective Earthrune
Protective Earthrune.description: Your earthrune transforms the outer surface of your body into a powerful protective armor as effective as a breastplate, defending you from physical harm. Your body is medium armor in the plate armor group that grants a +4 item bonus to AC, a Dex cap of +1, a check penalty of –2, a speed penalty of –5 feet, and a Strength value of 16, and has the comfort trait. You can never wear other armor or remove this armor, unless you retrain the feat and remove the earthrune. You can etch armor runes into your body to complement your earthrune, allowing you to upgrade your body’s armor as normal.

Push Past Death.name: Push Past Death
Push Past Death.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition and are about to attempt a recovery check.

You refuse to step any closer to death’s door; instead, you wrench yourself bodily from the doorway, bust up the frame, and return for one final push to defeat your foes. You’re restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Unconscious]{Unconscious} conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition as normal when losing the dying condition in this way.

Push Past Pain.name: Push Past Pain
Push Past Pain.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition.

When injured, you grit your teeth and force your body to heal by the strength of your will alone. For the next 4 rounds, you gain fast healing equal to half your level, plus twice the value of your wounded condition (for example, fast healing 10 if you are 9th level and wounded 3).

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-indigo-isles-character-guide-pf2e.indigo-isles-effects.X1XDod1R1wHoPCGd]{Effect: Push Past Pain}

Quick Disassemble.name: Quick Disassemble
Quick Disassemble.description:
Requirements You are holding an item of 1 Bulk or less.

You attempt to quickly disassemble enough crucial pieces of the item you’re holding that it won’t work until someone fixes it. Make a Crafting check against the same DC it would take to Craft the item you are holding, with effects depending on your result. If you try to use this action on an item that is especially difficult to harm or destroy, such as a cursed item or an artifact, you automatically fail.

Critical Success You disassemble the item so well that simple repairs won’t suffice. The item is effectively destroyed and reduced to its constituent parts. You can choose to take the results of a success instead if you prefer not to destroy the item so thoroughly.

Success You disassemble just enough pieces that the item won’t work until it’s fixed. The item becomes broken.

Failure You aren’t able to disassemble the item, and the item is unaffected.

Prismatic Call.name: 虹光呼唤 Prismatic Call
Prismatic Call.description:
频率 每天一次

无论那是鹦鹉人庇护女神奇拉，还是混沌位面遗忘之城（Limbo），又或是深渊的无限恶意的力量，你都能将这股力量唤到体内，并将这股毁灭性的力量通过呼喊释放。不同的情绪创造出灵体力场，让鹦鹉人能用真彩视野看到声音，就如听到声音一样简单。除了基于听觉而非光线，该效果等同于7环法术@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.d6o52BnjViNz7Gub]{虹光喷射 Prismatic Spray}，使用你的职业DC或法术DC（取其高者）。

Reaver's Suspicion.name: Reaver's Suspicion
Reaver's Suspicion.description: You not only keep an eye out for opportunities to take advantage of others, but you keep careful watch to guard against anyone who might do the same to you. You can’t be flanked by creatures of your level or lower.

Rending Hurricane.name: 毁灭飓风 Rending Hurricane
Rending Hurricane.description:
频率 每小时一次

唤出更深层的情绪源泉，你将撕裂狂风化为一场强大的飓风。如果你下一个动作是撕裂狂风，选择一个你正在处理的情绪动荡。你将这种动荡置入狂风中，将其范围扩大到@template[cone|distance:30]，并将伤害骰从d4增加到d8。

Resonant Refrain.name: 共鸣副歌 Resonant Refrain
Resonant Refrain.description: 你与影响灵魂的各种位面联系如此之深，到了能在物理意义上旅行到该位面的程度。伟大神曲即为小艇，你自己的灵魂则为音叉。选择混沌之城（Limbo）、涅槃境或深渊。你能以神术内在法术的形式施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{跨界传送 Interplanar Teleport}，每周两次，目标只能是你自己。你只能旅行至选定位面，你的灵魂充当位面密钥。

Ripping Horns.name: Ripping Horns
Ripping Horns.description: Sharp barbs on your horns—whether from naturally-occurring growths or carefully carved from them—inflict jagged wounds. Your piercing horn Strikes deal an additional [[/r 1d4[persistent,bleed]]] damage on a critical hit.

Rock Fist.name: Rock Fist
Rock Fist.description: Your fists are as hard as rock, allowing you to make lethal punches and similar attacks and push your foes around the battlefield. Your fists lose the nonlethal trait and gain the shove trait. Additionally, when you take this feat, you can choose to have your fists lose the agile trait and in exchange increase the damage die from 1d4 to 1d6. Once you make the choice to remove the agile trait, you can’t change it.

Rock and Roll.description: When you perform a Kragrak Roll, you are an unstoppable juggernaut, flattening all in your path. If you hit an obstacle on any turn, including the first, the obstacle takes @Damage[6d6[bludgeoning]] damage and you are unharmed. If this is enough to break the obstacle, you can choose to stop or keep rolling. If you hit a creature, you can try to roll over them. Attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip} that creature, in addition to dealing damage; on a success, you can choose to stop or keep rolling, and if you keep rolling, you can move through the creature’s space. You don’t apply the multiple attack penalty from any such Trip attempts until after you finish resolving the full movement from Kragrak Roll.
Rock and Roll.name: Rock and Roll

Rock Form.name: Rock Form
Rock Form.description: You transform into a Medium-sized rock, disguising yourself from others. Perception checks don’t reveal your true nature, but a successful @Check[nature|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] or @Check[survival|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] check against the higher of your class DC or spell DC reveals that you appear to be a strange rock that doesn’t fit the area, and dissimilar from any similar nearby rock. While in rock form, you can observe everything around you, but you can’t act other than to end the effect, and your turn, by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. As a rock, your AC is 20, and only status bonuses, status penalties, circumstance bonuses, and circumstance penalties affect you. Any successes and critical successes you roll on Reflex saves while you’re in rock form are failures.

Rock Skin.name: Rock Skin
Rock Skin.description:
Your earthen form is covered in a thin protective outer layer of rock that isn’t part of your body, which can protect you from harm... at least until it chips away. During your daily preparations, you gain resistance 5 to physical damage (except adamantine). Any time this resistance prevents damage, it decreases by 1, to a minimum of 0. However, when your resistance is below 5, it slowly recovers itself over time; for every 10 minutes, it increases by 1, to a maximum of 5.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-indigo-isles-character-guide-pf2e.indigo-isles-effects.0taDFMX7HNXLiW5s]{Effect: Rock Skin}

Show of Force.name: Show of Force
Show of Force.description:
Frequency once per minute

You demonstrate your might by smashing something open. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Force Open]{Force Open} an opening or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Shove]{Shove} a creature, and then you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize} a creature. You don’t take a penalty to Force Open the opening for not having a crowbar, and you don’t take a penalty to Demoralize for not sharing a language.

Soaring Heart.name: 翱翔之心 Soaring Heart
Soaring Heart.description: 你与颂歌羽翼变得更加紧密，它们成为你身体的一部分。你从颂歌翱翔中获得的羽翼持续时间无限，除非你想解消它们。若你解消羽翼，你可以使用一个单动作交互来恢复它们，不限次数。

Song's Sorcery.name: 颂歌术法 Song's Sorcery
Song's Sorcery.description: 你与伟大神曲的联系为你带来一种异能魔法的天赋，它由构成伟大神曲本身的精神纽带和文化无意识铸造而成。选择一个来自异能法术列表的常见或你拥有获取许可的戏法。你可以将其作为异能内在法术任意施放。如通常情况那样，该戏法升阶到你等级的一半，向上取整。

Speak with Coral.name: Speak with Coral
Speak with Coral.description: You can communicate with any kind of coral, allowing you to find conversation partners in coral reefs of all types and kinds. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with coral. The GM determines which animals count as coral for the purpose of this ability.

Spirit Spotter.name: 灵魂哨兵 Spirit Spotter
Spirit Spotter.description: 你找到了一种能适应真彩视野信号输入的方法，它向你展示虚能生命精华及灵魂精华形成的魔法效果，因此你能注意到通常藏在物体中、难以发觉的作祟和虚体生物。即使你没有在探索期模式中执行搜寻行动，你也能进行一次针对附近虚体不死生物和作祟的察觉检定，但承受-2环境减值。即使虚体不死生物或作祟藏在物体内部，你也可以这么做。如果你主动进行搜寻或搜索，你不必承受减值，并且在相应发现虚体不死生物和作祟的察觉检定中获得+2环境加值。

Song's Sovereignty.name: 颂歌神权 Song's Sovereignty
Song's Sovereignty.description: 你与伟大神曲之间的魔法联系如此强大，达到这种联系的巅峰，引出通常吟游诗人需要数年才能掌握的异能魔法。选择一个不高于3环的异能法术，以及一个不高于4环的异能法术。你必须满足它们的获取许可，且它们必须来自预言系、惑控系或幻术系学派。你能以异能内在法术的形式施展你选择的每个法术，每天一次。

Stoke Fear.name: Stoke Fear
Stoke Fear.description: Your attacks show cowards that you are the dominant warrior. When you hit a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} foe with a melee Strike, that foe can't reduce their frightened condition below 1 until the beginning of your next turn. After the first time this prevents the foe from reducing their frightened condition, that foe is then temporarily immune to your stoke fear for 1 minute.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description:
Frequency once every 10 minutes

Your tread is heavy, and you can stomp so hard that the ground cracks and buckles. You create difficult terrain in a @template[burst|distance:5] centered on one corner of your space. If you’re Large, the area increases to a @template[burst|distance:10], and if you’re Huge or Gargantuan, the area increases to a @template[burst|distance:15].

Sprite Weapon Mischief.name: Sprite Weapon Mischief
Sprite Weapon Mischief.description: You know how to perform pranks and make mischief on other creatures using traditional sprite weapons. Whenever you critically hit using a sprite weapon or one of the weapons listed in Sprite Weapon Familiarity, you apply the weapon’s critical specialization effect.

Taste Sensation.name: Taste Sensation
Taste Sensation.description: The food and drink you create is not only more flavorful but significantly more efficacious than is typical, even for other orpoks. Potions and elixirs you make that have an effect with a duration of at least 5 minutes provide their effects for an additional minute. If they have a duration of at least 1 hour, their effects last for an additional 10 minutes instead.

Sturdy Name.name: Sturdy Name
Sturdy Name.description: Through your great deeds and accomplishments, your name has gained more significance than other kragraks, and you can invoke it more often. You can use Invoke Name Mark once per hour, instead of once per day.

Stubborn Demeanor.description: You refuse to back down, even when faced with obvious danger. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against fear effects and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Will DC against Intimidation skill actions, such as attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize} you.
Stubborn Demeanor.name: Stubborn Demeanor

Tenacious Tendrils.name: Tenacious Tendrils
Tenacious Tendrils.description: Your tenacity allows you to create more powerful tendril traps more quickly. You can use Tendril Trap once per hour, instead of once per day, and creatures take [[/r 4[poison]]]{4 poison Damage} per square from your Tendril Trap, instead of 2 poison Damage.

Tendril Trap.name: Tendril Trap
Tendril Trap.description:
Frequency once per day

You grow venomous tendrils from the ground within 60 feet in a @template[burst|distance:20]. Thin venomous tendrils grow out from the ground in the area. The area becomes difficult terrain and hazardous terrain for 10 minutes underwater, or for 1 minute if the area isn’t underwater, after which the tendrils dry out and die. A creature that moves on the ground through the area takes [[/r 2[poison]]]{2 poison Damage} for every square of that area it moves into.

The Old Rumplank Snatch & Grab.name: The Old Rumplank Snatch & Grab
The Old Rumplank Snatch & Grab.description: You rush past a foe and attack them, distracting them and cutting their purse or otherwise forcefully taking their valuables. You Stride. At any point during your Stride, you can make a melee Strike against a single creature. If the Strike hits, you can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} from the target, even if the target is in combat. You still must meet any other requirements for the Steal action (they must be in reach, you need a free hand, and you can only Steal certain types of items, as specified in the action’s description).

Turkey Trot.name: Turkey Trot
Turkey Trot.description: Like migratory meleagris g’mayuns long ago, you lead groups of allies through various regions, always hustling to make good time on your expeditions. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5ZsmRm7HvFAw2XDZ]{Caravan Leader} and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.38uOVS8fLZxraUrg]{Pick Up The Pace} general feats, even if you don’t meet the prerequisites.

Tusk Terror.name: Tusk Terror
Tusk Terror.description: Your skill with your tusks allows you to make brutal attacks that stun your foes. When you critically hit with your tusk attack, you apply its critical specialization effect.

Venomous Infusion.name: Venomous Infusion
Venomous Infusion.description: You can release venom into your foes after you land a telling blow, with extra effect if you’re using your tentacle from the tendrilweaver heritage. On a critical hit with a melee Strike against an adjacent enemy, you inject venom into your foe, causing it to take [[/r 1d4[persistent,poison]]] damage. If you have the tendrilweaver heritage, this persistent poison damage also applies on a critical hit with your tentacle Strike from the tendrilweaver heritage, even if you aren’t adjacent, and it increases to [[/r 1d6[persistent,poison]]] damage on a critical hit with your tentacle Strike from the tendrilweaver heritage if you’re adjacent.

Violent Comeback.name: Violent Comeback
Violent Comeback.description: You respond with a sudden and powerful flare of fury when an opponent overwhelms you physically and revenge comes quickly to mind for this indignity. If a foe your size or larger knocks you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}, that foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} to you for 1 round. If a foe reduces you to 0 Hit Points, that foe is flat-footed to you for 1 round after you regain consciousness.

Volcanic Destruction.name: Volcanic Destruction
Volcanic Destruction.description: While many kragraks envision volcanic eruptions as a primal and resplendent form of rebirth, you understand how to use them for destructive purposes as well. In fact, you’ve even learned how to call forth eruptions at a rate that should alarm everyone living nearby. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O7ZEqWjwdKyo2CUv]{Volcanic Eruption} as an innate primal spell.

X Marks the Spot.name: X Marks the Spot
X Marks the Spot.description:
You make two quick attacks against your foe, forming an X and marking a vulnerability for your allies to exploit. Strike twice against the same foe. If both Strikes hit, the foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until your next turn, and each of your allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus on their next attack rolls against that foe before your next turn. If both Strikes are critical hits, the circumstance bonus is +2 instead of +1.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-indigo-isles-character-guide-pf2e.indigo-isles-effects.nmlpabAhKbHxcRzH]{Effect: X Marks the Spot}

Booty Finder.name: Booty Finder
Booty Finder.description: You have an innate sense for treasure and booty, and your larcenous nature and cupidity mean that you agonize over any such loot you might have missed through lack of searching. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to find hidden treasure and when using Recall Knowledge to determine the value of treasure. Even if you aren’t Searching, the GM rolls you a secret check to find hidden treasure that normally requires you to be Searching. You still need to meet any other requirements to find the treasure.

Bellowing Purification.name: Bellowing Purification
Bellowing Purification.description:
Frequency once per day

You give a mighty bellow that shakes you to your core, pitting your will against forces that assail your body or spirit. Attempt an @Check[intimidation] check to counteract a single curse, disease, or poison that afflicts you. As normal, your counteract level is equal to half your level, rounded up. If you are legendary in Intimidation, you can attempt Intimidation checks against each curse, disease, and poison that afflicts you.

Blessed Song.name: 祝福之歌 Blessed Song
Blessed Song.description: 不管你的祝福来自天族、幻蛇还是恶魔，你可以颂唱小型的祝福来增强盟友的攻击，并用歌声扩大祝福范围。你能以神术内在法术的形式施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{祝福术 Bless}，每天一次。

Bully.name: Bully
Bully.description: You know how to dominate others with a mere look. You are trained in Intimidation (or another skill of your choice if you're already trained in Intimidation) and gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Intimidating Glare} skill feat as a bonus feat.

Chochori Lore.name: Chochori Lore
Chochori Lore.description: While the many chochori origin stories are varied and contradictory, you’ve learned as many as you can, as well as all other sorts of stories about spiritual topics and forces of nature. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Nature and Religion. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Chochori Lore.

Chochori Weapon Expertise.name: Chochori Weapon Expertise
Chochori Weapon Expertise.description: You combine your knowledge of chochori weapons and your class’s training, allowing you to get the most out of chochori weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in daggers, halberds, lances, longspears, rapiers, spears, tridents, and all chochori weapons in which you are trained.

Chochori Weapon Familiarity.name: Chochori Weapon Familiarity
Chochori Weapon Familiarity.description: You know how to fight with a variety of aquadynamic piercing weapons. You are trained with daggers, halberds, lances, longspears, rapiers, spears, tridents. In addition, you gain access to all uncommon chochori weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial chochori weapons are simple weapons and advanced chochori weapons are martial weapons.

Coral Form.name: Coral Form
Coral Form.description: You transform into a sessile Medium-sized patch of coral, disguising yourself from others. Perception checks don’t reveal your true nature, but a successful @Check[nature|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] or @Check[survival|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] check against the higher of your class DC or spell DC reveals that you appear to be a patch of coral that is strangely new to the area, and disconnected from any similar nearby coral. While in coral form, you can observe everything around you, but you can’t act other than to end the effect, and your turn, by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. As a patch of coral, your AC is 20, and only status bonuses, status penalties, circumstance bonuses, and circumstance penalties affect you. While you are coral, any successes and critical successes you roll on Reflex saves are failures.

Curse of the Waves.name: Curse of the Waves
Curse of the Waves.description: You curse your foe with the wrath of the waves, causing the water itself to sicken them. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.z2mfh3oPnfYqXflY]{Mariner's Curse} once per day as a primal innate spell.

Demon Hunter.name: 恶魔猎人 Demon Hunter
Demon Hunter.description: 你利用伟大神曲中残留的恶魔联系发现恶魔的弱点，进而直击要害。对抗恶魔时，你的武器和无武装打击的伤害获得等于武器骰数量的环境加值（最初+1，强击武器+2以此类推）。当你对恶魔成功使用回忆知识时，除了正常获得的信息，你还能得知它的罪孽弱点；如果你已经知道它的罪孽弱点，你转而获得另一条信息。如果你是铁喙鹦鹉人，在计算恶魔的寒铁弱点时，你的鸟喙无武装打击被视为寒铁打击（但对其他如寒铁弱点的生物无效，如精类）。如果你是夜视鸟鹦鹉人，你在对抗恶魔的察觉检定和DC上获得+2环境加值。

Dolent Crescendo.name: 忧郁渐强音 Dolent Crescendo
Dolent Crescendo.description:
频率 每小时一次

你的忧郁咏叹调逐渐来到令人惊叹的强音最高点，影响附近的所有敌人。如果你的下一个动作是使用忧郁咏叹调，则它能影响60尺内的所有敌人，而非原本的一个敌人。

Earth's Embrace.name: Earth's Embrace
Earth's Embrace.description:
Frequency once per hour

You discorporate your body into a cloud of sediment (ash for ash kragraks, soil for boulder kragraks, salt for salt kragraks, or sand for sand kragraks) for 5 minutes, which is light enough to be picked up by the breeze. In this state, you’re amorphous. You lose any item bonus to AC and all other effects and bonuses from armor, and you use your proficiency modifier for unarmored defense. You gain resistance 10 to physical damage and are immune to precision damage. You can’t cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. You gain a fly Speed of 10 feet and can slip through tiny cracks.

Elemental Aftershock.name: Elemental Aftershock
Elemental Aftershock.description: When you critically hit your foe with a melee unarmed attack, you can unleash an elemental aftershock, causing lingering energy damage. This deals 1d4 persistent damage to your foe of a type associated with your secondary element: negative damage for death, fire damage for fire, force damage for force, cold damage for ice, positive damage for life, electricity damage for lightning, sonic damage for music, or poison damage for poison. As normal, positive damage only harms undead or other creatures with negative affinity.

Elder Magic.name: Elder Magic
Elder Magic.description: You can cast a simple magic spell drawn from the primal elements of the world around you. Choose a cantrip from the primal spell list. You can cast this cantrip as a primal innate spell at will. As normal for cantrips, the cantrip is heightened to half your level, rounded up.

Emissary Familiar.name: 使者魔宠 Emissary Familiar
Emissary Familiar.description: 你的鹦鹉或热带鸟魔宠是一个被称为神圣使者的特殊实体，它拥有自己的目的，从神国派遣而来。当你选择本专长时，选择一个与魔宠的神圣来源相符的阵营：若为鹦鹉人的庇护女神则选择善良，若为幻蛇则选择混乱中立，若为恶魔则选择混乱邪恶。根据GM判断，你可以选择其他阵营或神圣来源。魔宠的阵营与你选择的一致。它获得说话魔宠能力作为附赠能力，因此不计入正常的能力数量限制中。另外，它能以神术内在法术的形式施放神导术，每分钟一次。

Enduring Glare.name: Enduring Glare
Enduring Glare.description: The wave of force generated by your stern glare and buoyed by your unflinching willpower reaches magical heights, allowing you to create an angry face out of force to interpose for you. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rMGkk23qWvxTmgA8]{Forceful Hand} as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but it takes the shape of your scowling face rather than a disembodied hand.

Expanded Scent.name: Expanded Scent
Expanded Scent.description: Your sense of smell is particularly refined. Increase the range of your scent imprecise sense from 30 feet to 60 feet.

Extra Grease.name: Extra Grease
Extra Grease.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabbed}

The tight grip causes your body to exude an extra bit of grease. You cease being grabbed, then Step.

Go Cold Turkey.name: Go Cold Turkey
Go Cold Turkey.description:
Frequency once per hour

Using your magic, you help an ally tough out an affliction, which clears the affliction from their system but might be more dangerous than a more gradual treatment. Choose to target yourself or a touched ally, then choose one ongoing affliction from which the target is suffering. The target immediately attempts saving throws against the affliction with a +1 status bonus, until either the affliction is cleared or they have attempted five saving throws, whichever comes first. They take all the usual effects of any failed saving throws, so this could prove harmful to the target or even kill them if they fail often enough to result in death.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-indigo-isles-character-guide-pf2e.indigo-isles-effects.OU2t7wTPJF0XndsP]{Effect: Go Cold Turkey}

Hardriggan Lore.name: Hardriggan Lore
Hardriggan Lore.description: You grew up among those who taught you much about hardriggan culture, and you learned all that you could. You are trained in both Athletics and Survival. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Hardriggan Lore.

Hardriggan Weapon Brutality.name: Hardriggan Weapon Brutality
Hardriggan Weapon Brutality.description: Your talent for swinging big weapons means you can get the most out of them when they connect, and you learn how to use them to their full potential. Whenever you critically hit using your horn, a hardriggan weapon, or one of the weapons you are trained with from the Hardriggan Weapon Familiarity feat, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Kragrak Lore.name: Kragrak Lore
Kragrak Lore.description: You’ve studied with the older kragraks in your settlement and learned about the elements and the world around you, as well as the old stories. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Nature and Survival. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Kragrak Lore.

Mystical Chef.name: Mystical Chef
Mystical Chef.description: Your ability to conjure and season food is downright magical. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mt6ZzkVX8Q4xigFq]{Create Food} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rdTEF1hfAWbN58NE]{Enhance Victuals} each once per day as 2nd-level primal innate spells. At 13th level, enhance victuals is heightened to 3rd level. At 17th level, both spells are heightened to 4th level.

Orpok Welcome.name: Orpok Welcome
Orpok Welcome.description: You make friends with other orpoks easily, and you have orpok connections in nearly every settlement where they reside. After you have spent at least one day in a settlement that has at least a dozen orpoks living openly there, you gain a +1 circumstance to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Gather Information} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Earn Income]{Earn Income} in that settlement.

Polyp Regeneration.name: Polyp Regeneration
Polyp Regeneration.description:
Frequency once per day

You quickly grow specialized polyps to replace damaged or destroyed parts of yourself, in order to heal yourself and replace missing organs or limbs. You temporarily gains regeneration 15, which restores 15 Hit Points to you at the start of each of your turns. While you have regeneration, you can’t die from damage and its dying condition can’t increase to a value that would kill you (this stops you from going beyond dying 3 unless you would die at a different value than dying 4), though if your wounded value becomes 4 or higher, you stay @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Unconscious]{Unconscious} until your wounds are treated. If you take acid or fire damage, your regeneration deactivates until after the end of your next turn. Each time you regains Hit Points from regeneration, you also regrows one damaged or ruined organ or body part (if any).

Parrot Familiar.name: 鹦鹉魔宠 Parrot Familiar
Parrot Familiar.description: 你与一只鹦鹉或其他热带鸟类缔结魔宠链接。你依据《核心规则书》的魔宠规则获得一只魔宠，该魔宠必须为一只鹦鹉或其他热带鸟类。它仍然具有魔宠能力的所有好处，但它的基础形态仍为鹦鹉或其他热带鸟类。因此，它必须具有飞行（Flier）能力。

Rending Squall.name: 撕裂狂风 Rending Squall
Rending Squall.description:
你在狂风暴雨般的的尖叫声（或其他高声呼喊）中宣泄激荡的情绪，对声波区域内的生物造成伤害。暴风狂野地奔流而出、合并，最终形成一个@template[cone|distance:15]范围，造成@Damage[1d4[sonic]]伤害。每个区域内生物必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic]豁免对抗你的职业DC或法术DC，取其高者。你在[[/r 1d4 #Rending Squall Recharge]]{1d4轮}内无法再使用撕裂狂风。

在3级及之后每2级，伤害增加1d4。 ([[/r (ceil(@actor.level/2)d4)[sonic]]]{按等级计算的伤害}

特殊 当你选择此专长时，选择你的撕裂狂风具有的特征：若你的情绪来自伟大神曲，选择异能特征；如果来源为神灵、天族或恶魔则为神术特征。撕裂狂风根据其力量来源获得你选择的特征。

Revitalizing Snack.name: Revitalizing Snack
Revitalizing Snack.description: When you use @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-indigo-isles-character-guide-pf2e.indigo-isles-feats.Rrihbij0QwDXrkVy]{Healthy Snack}, you can also reduce the value of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} condition by 1. Once per day, when you use Healthy Snack, you can reduce the value of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} condition by 1 instead.

Song's Flight.name: 颂歌翱翔 Song's Flight
Song's Flight.description:
频率 每天一次

汲取伟大神曲的力量，你暂时长出音符点缀的彩虹色羽翼。翅膀持续5分钟，在此期间，你获得等于你速度的飞行速度。

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-indigo-isles-character-guide-pf2e.indigo-isles-effects.je8wUhqrM8eZr25f]{效果: 颂歌翱翔}

Song's Secrets.name: 颂歌秘法 Song's Secrets
Song's Secrets.description: 你与伟大神曲直接的联系变得足够强大，赋予你更强大的秘密，你可以利用它们，将曲调转化为异能魔法。选择一个1环异能法术和一个不高于2环的异能法术。你必须满足它们的获取许可，且它们必须来自预言系、惑控系或幻术系学派。你能以异能内在法术的形式施展你选择的每个法术，每天一次。

Sprite Weapon Expertise.name: Sprite Weapon Expertise
Sprite Weapon Expertise.description: You use a little bit of fey magic to enhance your weapon training, granting you improved understanding of your sprite weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in longbows, composite longbows, rapiers, shortbows, composite shortbows, shortswords and all sprite weapons in which you are trained.

Sprite Weapon Familiarity.description:
You favor bows, dextrous blades, and the weapons of the fey. You are trained with longbows, composite longbows, rapiers, shortbows, composite shortbows, and shortswords.

In addition, you gain access to all uncommon sprite weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial sprite weapons are simple weapons and advanced sprite weapons are martial weapons.
Sprite Weapon Familiarity.name: Sprite Weapon Familiarity

Strong Piercings.name: Strong Piercings
Strong Piercings.description: You have piercings that incorporate hooks or studs upon which you can, in a pinch, hang items. You can wear up to 1 Bulk of items that are each light Bulk or less, so long as each item has a hook or hole allowing it to hang on a piercing. Placing an item onto a piercing or retrieving it from a piercing requires a single Interact action. Your piercings allow you to wear up to 1 additional Bulk of tools (normally, 3 Bulk of tools instead of 2 Bulk), so long as the excess tools hang from your piercings.

The Dead Tell No Tales.name: The Dead Tell No Tales
The Dead Tell No Tales.description: You remind others that the dead keep secrets best of all, scaring them into silence. Due to your fearsome reputation threatening others into silence (and explicit activities you take to do so such as using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce} action), it becomes much more difficult to gain information you’re trying to suppress. Checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request} the information, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Gather Information}, or otherwise get someone to divulge the information in question when you’re actively attempting to suppress it, must exceed your Intimidation DC, in addition to all other relevant DCs. If they succeed at the other DC but not against your Intimidation DC, they are able to determine that people know the information but are too scared to reveal what it is.

Towering Growth.name: Towering Growth
Towering Growth.description: You can grow to become a true giant on the battlefield. You gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} constantly.

Wandering Waves.name: Wandering Waves
Wandering Waves.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger A creature within 60 feet Swims.

You manipulate the triggering creature’s perceptions of the water, creating phantom waves and leading them astray. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC, with the following effects.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The waves seem to be against any move the creature takes. The creature treats all squares as difficult terrain during its Swim action.

Critical Failure As failure, except that you determine where the target moves during the Swim, though you can’t move it into hazardous terrain or a similar dangerous location.

Truecolor Revelation.name: 真彩揭示 Truecolor Revelation
Truecolor Revelation.description: 你的真彩视野效力极强，你甚至可以看到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}生物和物体在你眼中形成不寻常的色块。隐形生物和物体对你来说为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}，而非因隐形导致的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}或无踪。

Wayward Wanderer.name: Wayward Wanderer
Wayward Wanderer.description: You can feel the ripples and waves around you much more consistently than other chochori, allowing you to lead your foes astray more often. You can use Wandering Waves once per 10 minutes, instead of once per day.

Yo Ho Ho and a Bottle of Rum!.name: Yo Ho Ho and a Bottle of Rum!
Yo Ho Ho and a Bottle of Rum!.description:
Frequency once per hour

You withdraw and swig a drink of alcohol in order to overcome a difficult situation and give yourself a dose of liquid courage. Interact to draw a drink of alcohol and then Interact again to drink it; this can’t be a special alchemical alcohol that has additional effects beyond the base effects of alcohol. You gain 3 temporary Hit Points per level for 2 rounds and attempt a counteract check against a mental effect currently affecting you, using your Will save modifier as the counteract modifier and half your level rounded up as the counteract level. If the counteract check doesn’t remove the mental effect, you can’t try to remove it again with Yo Ho Ho and a Bottle of Rum! You don’t have to attempt a saving throw against the alcohol, and you don’t gain any other special benefits from other abilities that require you to drink alcohol, or that occur when you drink alcohol.

Whimsical Inclination.name: 随心癖好 Whimsical Inclination
Whimsical Inclination.description:
频率 每天一次

你的兴趣转换非常频繁，因此你能迅速抓住一个概念，并对它由一个基本理解。你花费1分钟与在某技能上有受训熟练度的人交流、或阅读手册、或从其他来源汲取技能信息，填鸭式学习了该技能的基本信息，并能使用该技能的基础功能。当你这样做时，你获得该技能的受训熟练度。该熟练度持续到你下次准备。由于这种熟练度是暂时的，你不能将其当做技能提升或永久角色选项（如专长）的先决条件。

label: 靛蓝群岛专长 Indigo Isles Feats
